level.heading: Manager meeting, and notice requirements.
level.text: Notice and quorum requirements for meetings of managers and the conduct of meetings of managers shall be determined by the governing principles.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 24 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
